entry.title: President Biden Wins First Official Democratic Primary, Besting Long-Shot Challenger Dean Phillips
entry.summary: President Biden has won the Democratic primary in South Carolina overwhelmingly, as two opponents garner only a minuscule percentage of the vote.

entry.title: NYC to Give Migrant Families Pre-Paid Credit Cards Under $53 Million Pilot Program: Report

entry.title: James Biden to Appear before House Oversight Committee in Impeachment Inquiry
entry.summary: Hunter Biden will appear before the committee just one week after his uncle James for a private deposition.

entry.summary: MOTOKO RICH2024å¹´1æœˆ25æ—¥90å²çš„é»‘æŸ³å½»å­åœ¨ã€Šå½»å­çš„æˆ¿é—´ã€‹çš„å½•å½±æ£šï¼Œæ‘„äºæœ¬æœˆåˆã€‚è¿™ä¸ªè„±å£ç§€èŠ‚ç›®å§‹äº1976å¹´ï¼Œå»å¹´å¤å¤©è·å¾—åŒä¸€åä¸»æŒäººä¸»æŒèŠ‚ç›®æœŸæ•°çš„å‰å°¼æ–¯ä¸–ç•Œçºªå½•ã€‚ Noriko Hayashi for The New York Times Pushing a walker through a television studio in central Tokyo earlier this week, Tetsuko Kuroyanagi slowly climbed three steps onto a sound stage with the help of an assistant who settled her into a creamy beige Empire armchair. æœ¬å‘¨æ—©äº›æ—¶å€™ï¼Œé»‘æŸ³å½»å­æ¨ç€åŠ©è¡Œå™¨åœ¨ä¸œäº¬ä¸­å¿ƒä¸€åº§ç”µè§†æ¼”æ’­å®¤èµ°è¿‡ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸€ä½åŠ©æ‰‹çš„ååŠ©ä¸‹æ…¢æ…¢çˆ¬ä¸Šä¸‰çº§å°é˜¶ï¼Œæ¥åˆ°èˆå°ä¸Šï¼Œåè¿›ä¸€å¼ å¥¶æ²¹ç±³è‰²æ‰¶æ‰‹æ¤…ã€‚ A stylist removed the custom-made sturdy boots on her feet and slipped on a pair of high-heeled mules. entry.summary: MICHELLE COTTLE2024å¹´1æœˆ23æ—¥ Damon Winter/The New York Times And just like that, Ron DeSantisâ€™s quest for the presidency is kaput. In a short video on Sunday, the Florida governor looked natty in a blue suit and red tie, every hair perfectly in place as he papered over his deeply imperfect campaign. He touted his own leadership and, perhaps with an eye toward running again in 2028, endorsed the Republican kingmaker, Donald Trump. It wasnâ€™t a terrible performance, especially under the circumstances. But watching DeSantisâ€™s now-famous awkward smile and listening to his unnatural cadence, it was hard not to think: Yeah. entry.title: Tim Scott Endorses Trump Days before New Hampshire Primary
entry.summary: At a New Hampshire rally on Friday, the former Republican presidential contender voiced his support for Trump over Haley and DeSantis.

entry.title: Justin Amash: The Career Anti-politician
entry.summary: Rather than use elected office to improve politics, Amash offers commentary while accomplishing nothing.

entry.title: U.S. Conducts Fourth Round of Strikes on Houthi Missile Sites That Were Preparing to Launch
entry.summary: The Israel-Hamas war has thrust the Middle East into turmoil, with Pakistan launching strikes against separatist hideouts in Iran on Thursday.

entry.summary: DANA G. SMITH2024å¹´1æœˆ18æ—¥ Keith Negley My father decided to start learning French when he was 57. He hired a tutor to meet with him twice a week and diligently completed his homework before every lesson. Before long, he was visiting the French bakery across town to practice his pronunciation (and buy macarons). Now, 20 years later, heâ€™s on his third tutor. çˆ¶äº²åœ¨57å²æ—¶å†³å®šå¼€å§‹å­¦æ³•è¯­ã€‚ä»–è¯·äº†ä¸€ä½å®¶æ•™ï¼Œæ¯å‘¨ä¸Šä¸¤æ¬¡è¯¾ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æ¯æ¬¡è¯¾å‰éƒ½å‹¤å¥‹åœ°å®Œæˆä½œä¸šã€‚æ²¡è¿‡å¤šä¹…ï¼Œä»–å°±å¼€å§‹å»é•‡å­å¦ä¸€å¤´é‚£å®¶æ³•å›½é¢åŒ…åº—ç»ƒä¹ å‘éŸ³ï¼ˆä¹°é©¬å¡é¾™ï¼‰ã€‚ç°åœ¨ï¼Œ20å¹´è¿‡å»äº†ï¼Œå®¶æ•™å·²ç»æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªäº†ã€‚ On the surface, his retirement hobby seems a little random â€” our family has no connection to French-speaking countries â€” but his motivation ran deeper than a passion for pastries. My grandmother developed signs of Alzheimerâ€™s disease in her early 70s, and studies suggest that being bilingual can delay the onset of the condition by up to five â€¦

entry.title: Francis Collins Admits Plausibility of Lab-Leak Theory in House Testimony
entry.summary: The former NIH director also admitted that the six-foot social-distancing recommendation was likely not based on any scientific data.

entry.title: Trump Ordered to Pay New York Times Nearly $400,000 after Failed Lawsuit
entry.summary: Trump filed a $100 million lawsuit in 2021 after his niece, Mary Trump, gave his confidential tax records to journalists at the paper.

entry.title: U.S. Launches Second Round of Air Strikes on Yemen-Based Houthis

entry.title: DeSantis Orders Florida Universities to Expedite Transfer Process for Jewish Students Facing Persecution
entry.summary: The order will clear credit-hour and application-window requirements that would hinder an otherwise academically eligible transfer student.

entry.title: Not-China Is Much Bigger Than China
entry.summary: The U.S. should pursue free-trade agreements with friendly countries as part of its strategy to counter China.

entry.title: The Progressive Blob Is Consuming Our Institutions
entry.summary: Elites putting progressivism ahead of their institutional duties is a threat to everyone.
